summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 34, Heirs of Sarah A. Bell's 2nd Addition, being the alley between 9th Avenue and Terry Avenue from Howell Street to Stewart Street; by paving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 14588 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
